search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for FreshLearn (freshlearn.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page URL for FreshLearn is: [https://freshlearn.com/pricing](https://freshlearn.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

extracted_content.content:
Creator friendly pricing.  
Unlimited everything
------------------------------------------------

FreshLearn empowers you to turn your knowledge into courses, cohorts, live workshops, digital downloads and start a successful online business.

.

*   Free up to 25 sales
*   No credit card required

#### Free

Best for new creators building and launching digital products

### $0

[Sign up free](https://app.freshlearn.com/#/register)

*   Custom Branding
*   Video Hosting
*   Sales Page Builder
*   Checkout Pages
*   Blogging CMS
*   Testimonials
*   Link In Bio
*   25 Enrolments (Paid or Free)
*   1 Administrator
*   Email Support

[Request Demo](https://freshlearn.com/schedule-a-call)

##### All features of No Brainer+ plan, plus:

*   Partner Organisation Groups
*   Single Sign-On for Learners
*   Multi-Factor Authentication
*   Auto Language Translation
*   Custom Reports
*   Custom Integrations
*   Sandbox Instance

Answers to some questions you may have
--------------------------------------

Can't find the answer here? Visit our Help Center.

#### Do member's payments hit my bank directly?

Yes, you connect the payment gateways to your account, and all the payments from your members will hit your bank account directly.

#### What are the channels of customer support?

We would be happy to answer your queries via chat, zoom call, or email. You can also find the detailed support documentation here.

#### Where is FreshLearn from?

FreshLearn is a USA-registered company. We strongly believe in working from remote culture. Therefore, our team is spread worldwide.

#### Do Freshlearn really do migration ?

Yes, 100%. We do free migration for No Brainer & Plus Yearly plans. The migration includes the courses, pages, members and enrolments data as well. For more details, [click here](https://freshlearn.com/free-migration)

#### Will you keep improving the FreshLearn platform?

We are very active in launching new features and enhancements. You can look at our last 12 months' product updates [here.](https://freshlearn.com/productupdates)

#### What is refund policy?

There is a 14 day refund policy for the yearly plans. There will be no refunds if the migration is initiated and / or there is an offer availed on the plans.

Testimonials

Creators Love  FreshLearn
-------------------------

Creators love FreshLearn for its ease of use, affordability, advanced features, and always-available support team.

### 15K+

Creators

### 30M+

Earnings

![Image 1: freshlearn g2 badge1](https://web-cdn.freshlearn.com/website/Orange_OnlineLearningPlatform_HighPerformer_HighPerformer.svg)

![Image 2: freshlearn g2 badge2](https://web-cdn.freshlearn.com/website/Orange_OnlineLearningPlatform_HighPerformer_Small-Business_HighPerformer.svg)

![Image 3: freshlearn g2 badge3](https://web-cdn.freshlearn.com/website/trustpilot_centeralign.svg)

FreshLearn is a great platform

FreshLearn is a great platform for launching an online course, for easy to setup and integrate with Stripe/Paypal and custom domain. They also don't charge extra transaction fees. Awesome customer support. Highly recommended!!

Jared

New Zealand

FreshLearn is amazing !

Very friendly platform. The team was so helpful and quick. FreshLearn was so serious about leveraging the capability of online education. I am very impressed with the platform.

Lisa M

Business Owner

Website Migration made easy.

The Freshlearn team has been a huge help with our website and course migration. The migration team was able to work within out timeline to transition everything over and ensure that the website was exactly like we wanted.

Robert Gannon

Taiwan

Top level experts, fast and thorough!

Team is always friendly and professional. They are very eager to assist me and I am not tech savvy. I will continue to recommend FreshLearn to those who have interest without reservation. Having fast tech support is a great benefit that I didn't have with my last platform provider.

Jesse R. Brown ND

United States

Wow!

Wow. Real people really helping me instead of robots! Really friendly and super capable people too! Questions answered in seconds. A platform that delivers everything I was looking for. Definitely a five-star experience. I LOVE Freshlearn and its people!

Ewald Theunisse

Netherlands

Super learning platform

FreshLearn team gave me a lot of support setting up my site. This was my first time developing a course and i had lots of questions as i am not tech savvy. The team is patient, and no question is disregarded.

Sandra R.

United States

Amazing membership course software

The support is the best I've ever experienced for a software company. They are responsive and resolve issues fast. The migration from Teachable was seamless. It saved us about 6 hours if we had done it on our own. After three weeks from signing up for Freshlearn, we are ready to launch!

Adeah W.

Small Business Owner

Good Support

Got on the call with support about an API feature I needed. The call was straight forward, they said they will get in touch with the team and will be very honest with me for the timeline of such a feature request, even if that timeline would be very long or if they wouldn't implement the feature.

Brian Akhtar

United States

Great product and support.

I really like using freshlearn and the effort they put in to get it as I want. Before, I used a way more expensive option, which was actually too much overkill for what I needed.I recommend this to everyone who looks for a great platform at an affordable cost

Stijin

Belgium

Get advanced features, 24x7 live support for an affordable and creator friendly price. Starts with $0. Try FreshLearn for free!
